name: Epic Cargo Truck Simulator
description:
Take the journey on the longest roads and transport the material like the ceramic and cement pipes and barrels to the construction sites where they are needed the most. Drive carefully and do not trash the vehicle into the city roadside pavements. Exhausting long hour job of transporting and driving a heavy transport vehicle like pipe transport truck is tough. On the long routes you still have a time frame to follow so don’t be late in delivering the cargo to the destination it is required.
Epic Cargo Truck Simulator features:
• Best cargo truck adventure on the smoothest roads.
• Manual forward and reverse gear change to make the more precise sharp turns around the way
• Follow the route and reach the destination in time
• Smooth truck cargo gameplay enhanced by the 3D amazing graphics.
